```{r examples head}
div(class = "page-header",
    h2("Get Started"))
```

* Visit [five-line](http://www.five-line.org)
* Create an account
* Keep note of your credentials; username and password

```{r examples ex}
div(class = "page-header",
    h2("Examples"))
```

```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
# Authenticate - get token
fl_auth(username = "<your_username>", password = "<your_password>")

# get list of authors
aut <- list_aut()

# get limericks by first author
aut_lim <- get_aut(aut$id[1])

# get first limerick
lim <- get_lim(aut_lim$id[1])

# insert in Rmarkdown
insert_lim(lim)
```

```{r}
div(
  h5("A belle of Natchez"),
  p("There was a young belle of old Natchez,", br(),
    'Whose garments were always in patchez.', br(),
    'When comments arose, ', br(),
    'On the state of her clothes, ', br(),
    'She replied, "When Ah itchez, Ah scratchez."'
    )
)
```
